archimate:Goal.name: Activates to respond on security event implemented
archimate:Goal.documentation:
Goal definition based on the NIST Cybersecurity Framework - Wikipedia <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NIST_Cybersecurity_Framework>
The Security Monitoring service have adopted, implemented and operates according to defined target profile for the service. Target Profile is the defined Scope, SLA, method, capabilities, roles and responsibilities for Security Monitoring.
